item.title: Creating a Home Assistant Web Scraper Sensor
item.description: Here is a demonstration of using lxml for scraping a website to extract essential HTML data and pass the data as sensor to Home Assistant. GitHub: debsahu/lxmlWebScraper Here is a demonstration of using lxml for scraping a website to extract essential HTML data and pass the data as sensor to Home Assistant. Overview Installing lxml If working in virtual environment, install lxml using pip $ pip3 install lxml If working on python installation installed globally
